member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.AuxiliaryTypeProperty
member.summary: AuxiliaryTypeProperty box includes a URN identifying the type of the auxiliary image. AuxiliaryTypeProperty may additionally include other fields, as required by the URN.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.AuxiliaryTypeProperty.aux_type
member.summary: A null-terminated UTF-8 character string of the Uniform Resource Name (URN) used to identify the type of the associated auxiliary image item.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.AuxiliaryTypeProperty.aux_subtype
member.summary: Zero or more bytes until the end of the box. The semantics of these bytes depend on the value of aux_type.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.AuxiliaryTypeProperty.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.AuxiliaryTypeProperty.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box size.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box
member.summary: Structure for storing data in IsoBmff files.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box.size
member.summary: An integer that specifies the number of bytes in this box, including all its fields and contained boxes; if size is 1 then the actual size is in the field largesize; if size is 0, then this box is the last one in the file, and its contents extend to the end of the file

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box.type
member.summary: Identifies the box type; standard boxes use a compact type, which is normally four printable characters, to permit ease of identification, and is shown so in the boxes below. User extensions use an extended type; in this case, the type field is set to 'uuid'.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box.ExternalBoxConstructor
member.summary: External box constructor for unimplemented box types.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box._externalParsersDictionary
member.summary: Dictionary of external box constructors.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Create the box object from the box type and box size in bytes. This constructor doesn't read data from the stream.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader,FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box type.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box.ParceBox(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader)
member.summary: Read next box from stream.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box.SetExternalConstructor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType,FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box.ExternalBoxConstructor)
member.summary: Add external constructor for unimplemented box type.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.Box.UintToString(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Convert uint value to string with ASCII coding.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType
member.summary: Type of the container box. Used definitions from ISO IEC 14496 Part 12, ISO IEC 14496 Part 15 and ISO IEC 23008 Part 12.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.ftyp
member.summary: File type and compatibility. Located in the root.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.mdat
member.summary: Media data container. Located in the root.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.free
member.summary: Free space.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.skip
member.summary: Free space.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.moov
member.summary: Container for all the movie metadata. Located in the root.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.meta
member.summary: Metadata. Located in the root.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.hdlr
member.summary: Handler, declares the metadata (handler) type. Located in the 'meta' box.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.dinf
member.summary: Data information box, container. Located in the 'meta' box.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.dref
member.summary: Data reference box, declares source(s) of items. Located in the 'dinf' box.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.url
member.summary: Data reference box, declares source(s) of metadata items.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.urn
member.summary: Data reference box, declares source(s) of metadata items.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.iloc
member.summary: Item location. Located in the 'meta' box.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.BoxType.idat
member.summary: Item data. Located in the 'meta' box.

member.summary: Item information. Located in the 'meta' box.

member.summary: Item information entry. Located in the 'iinf' box.

member.summary: Thumbnails for the referenced track. Located in the 'iref' box.

member.summary: Primary item reference. Located in the 'meta' box.

member.summary: Item properties. Located in the 'meta' box.

member.summary: Item property association. Located in the 'iprp' box.

member.summary: List of item properties. Located in the 'iprp' box.

member.summary: AV1 coded item property. Located in the 'ipco' box.

member.summary: Colour information item property. Located in the 'ipco' box.

member.summary: Alternatives entity group. Located in the 'grpl' box.

member.summary: Scheme type box. Located in the 'sinf' box.

member.summary: Scheme information box. Located in the 'sinf' box.

member.summary: Extended type.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.CleanApertureBox
member.summary: The clean aperture transformative item property defines a cropping transformation of the input image.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.CleanApertureBox.cleanApertureWidthN
member.summary: A numerator of the fractional number which defines the exact clean aperture width, in counted pixels, of the image.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.CleanApertureBox.cleanApertureWidthD
member.summary: A denominator of the fractional number which defines the exact clean aperture width, in counted pixels, of the image.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.CleanApertureBox.cleanApertureHeightN
member.summary: A numerator of the fractional number which defines the exact clean aperture height, in counted pixels, of the image.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.CleanApertureBox.cleanApertureHeightD
member.summary: A denominator of the fractional number which defines the exact clean aperture height, in counted pixels, of the image.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.CleanApertureBox.horizOffN
member.summary: A numerator of the fractional number which defines the horizontal offset of clean aperture centre minus(width‐1)/2. Typically 0.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.CleanApertureBox.horizOffD
member.summary: A denominator of the fractional number which defines the horizontal offset of clean aperture centre minus(width‐1)/2. Typically 0.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.CleanApertureBox.vertOffN
member.summary: A numerator of the fractional number which defines the vertical offset of clean aperture centre minus(height‐1)/2. Typically 0.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.CleanApertureBox.vertOffD
member.summary: A denominator of the fractional number which defines the vertical offset of clean aperture centre minus(height‐1)/2. Typically 0.

member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box size.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ColourInformationBox
member.summary: Contains colour information about the image. If colour information is supplied in both this box, and also in the video bitstream, this box takes precedence, and over‐rides the information in the bitstream.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ColourInformationBox.colour_type
member.summary: An indication of the type of colour information supplied.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ColourInformationBox.colour_primaries
member.summary: Indicates the chromaticity coordinates of the source primaries.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ColourInformationBox.transfer_characteristics
member.summary: Indicates the reference opto-electronic transfer characteristic.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ColourInformationBox.matrix_coefficients
member.summary: Describes the matrix coefficients used in deriving luma and chroma signals from the green, blue, and red.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ColourInformationBox.full_range_flag
member.summary: Indicates the black level and range of the luma and chroma signals as derived from E′Y, E′PB, and E′PR or E′R, E′G, and E′B real-valued component signals.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ColourInformationBox.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ColourInformationBox.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box size.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.DataEntryUrlBox
member.summary: Data reference URL that declare the location of the media data used within the presentation. The data reference index in the sample description ties entries in this table to the samples in the track. A track may be split over several sources in this way.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.DataEntryUrlBox.name
member.summary: Name of the entry.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.DataEntryUrlBox.location
member.summary: Location of the entry.

member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream.

member.summary: The data information box contains objects that declare the location of the media information in a track.

member.summary: The data reference object contains a table of data references (normally URLs) that declare the location(s) of the media data used within the presentation.

member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.summary: Observable collection of the nested boxes.

member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box size.

member.summary: The data reference object contains a table of data references (normally URLs) that declare the location(s) of the media data used within the presentation.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.DataReferenceBox.entry_count
member.summary: The count of data references.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.DataReferenceBox.entries
member.summary: The list of data references.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.EntityToGroupBox
member.summary: The EntityToGroupBox specifies an entity group.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.EntityToGroupBox.group_id
member.summary: A non-negative integer assigned to the particular grouping that shall not be equal to any group_id value of any other EntityToGroupBox, any item_ID value of the hierarchy level(file, movie. or track) that contains the GroupsListBox, or any track_ID value(when the GroupsListBox is contained in the file level).

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.EntityToGroupBox.num_entities_in_group
member.summary: The number of entity_id values mapped to this entity group.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.EntityToGroupBox.entities
member.summary: Array of identificators of items that are present in the hierarchy level(file, movie or track) that contains the GroupsListBox, or to a track, when a track with track_ID equal to entity_id is present and the GroupsListBox is contained in the file level.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.EntityToGroupBox.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.EntityToGroupBox.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.FileTypeBox
member.summary: This box identifies the specifications to which this file complies.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.FileTypeBox.major_brand
member.summary:
A brand identifier.
Each brand is a printable four‐character code, registered with ISO, that identifies a precise specification.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.FileTypeBox.minor_version
member.summary:
An informative integer for the minor version of the major brand.
Each brand is a printable four‐character code, registered with ISO, that identifies a precise specification.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.FileTypeBox.compatible_brands
member.summary:
A list of compatible brands.
Each brand is a printable four‐character code, registered with ISO, that identifies a precise specification.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.FileTypeBox.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.FileTypeBox.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box size.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.FileTypeBox.IsBrandSupported(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Checks if specified brand is supported.
member.returns: True if brand is supported, false otherwise.

member.summary: Structure for storing data in IsoBmff files with specified box version and flags.

member.summary: An integer that specifies the version of this format of the box.

member.summary: A map of flags.

member.summary: Create the box object from the box type, size, version and flags. This constructor doesn't read data from the stream.
member.param: The version of this format of the box.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.GroupsListBox
member.summary: An entity group is a grouping of items, which may also group tracks. The entities in an entity group share a particular characteristic or have a particular relationship, as indicated by the grouping type.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.GroupsListBox.boxes
member.summary: List of nested boxes.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.GroupsListBox.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.GroupsListBox.Children
member.summary: Observable collection of the nested boxes.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.GroupsListBox.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader,System.UInt64,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream, box size and start position.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.HandlerBox
member.summary: This box declares media type of the track, and thus the process by which the media‐data in the track is presented.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.HandlerBox.handler_type
member.summary: When present in a media box, contains a value as defined in clause 12, or a value from a derived specification, or registration. When present in a meta box, contains an appropriate value to indicate the format of the meta box contents. The value 'null' can be used in the primary meta box to indicate that it is merely being used to hold resources.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.HandlerBox.name
member.summary: A null‐terminated string in UTF‐8 characters which gives a human‐readable name for the track type (for debugging and inspection purposes).

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.HandlerBox.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.HandlerBox.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItem
member.summary: Data class for organised storage on location data.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItem.item_ID
member.summary: An arbitrary integer 'name' for this resource which can be used to refer to it.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItem.construction_method
F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItem.data_reference_index
member.summary: Contains either zero (‘this file’) or a 1‐based index into the data references in the data information box.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItem.base_offset
member.summary: A base value for offset calculations within the referenced data. If base_offset_size equals 0, base_offset takes the value 0, i.e. it is unused.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItem.extent_count
member.summary: Provides the count of the number of extents into which the resource is fragmented; it must have the value 1 or greater.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItem.extents
member.summary: Array of extent data.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItem.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItemExtent
member.summary: Data class for organised storage on location data extents.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItemExtent.index
member.summary: An index as defined for the constructionmethod.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItemExtent.offset
member.summary: The absolute offset, in bytes from the data origin of the container, of this extent data. If offset_size is 0, extent_offset takes the value 0.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItemExtent.length
member.summary: The absolute length in bytes of this metadata item extent. If length_size is 0, extent_length takes the value 0. If the value is 0, then length of the extent is the length of the entire referenced container.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IlocItemExtent.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ImageMirror
member.summary: The image mirroring item property mirrors the image about either a vertical or horizontal axis.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ImageMirror.axis
member.summary: Specifies a vertical (axis = 0) or horizontal (axis = 1) axis for the mirroring operation.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ImageMirror.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ImageMirror.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box size.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ImageRotation
member.summary: The image rotation transformative item property rotates the reconstructed image of the associated image item in anti-clockwise direction in units of 90 degrees.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ImageRotation.angle
member.summary: Specifies the angle (in anti-clockwise direction) in units of 90 degrees.

member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ImageRotation.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box size.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ImageSpatialExtentsProperty
member.summary: The ImageSpatialExtentsProperty documents the width and height of the associated image item. Every image item shall be associated with one property of this type, prior to the association of all transformative properties.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ImageSpatialExtentsProperty.image_width
member.summary: The width of the reconstructed image in pixels.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ImageSpatialExtentsProperty.image_height
member.summary: The height of the reconstructed image in pixels.

member.summary: The contained meta data in raw format.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoBox
member.summary: The item information box provides extra information about file entries.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoBox.entry_count
member.summary: A count of the number of entries in the info entry array.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoBox.item_infos
member.summary: Array of entries of extra information, each entry is formatted as a box. This array is sorted by increasing item_ID in the entry records.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoBox.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box size.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoEntry
member.summary: This box provides extra information about one entry.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoEntry.item_ID
member.summary: Contains either 0 for the primary resource (e.g., the XML contained in an 'xml ' box) or the ID of the item for which the following information is defined.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoEntry.item_protection_index
member.summary: Contains either 0 for an unprotected item, or the one‐based index into the item protection box defining the protection applied to this item(the first box in the item protection box has the index 1).

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoEntry.item_type
member.summary: A 32‐bit value, typically 4 printable characters, that is a defined valid item type indicator, such as 'mime'.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoEntry.item_name
member.summary: A null‐terminated string in UTF‐8 characters containing a symbolic name of the item (source file for file delivery transmissions).

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoEntry.content_type
member.summary: A null‐terminated string in UTF‐8 characters with the MIME type of the item. If the item is content encoded (see below), then the content type refers to the item after content decoding.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoEntry.item_uri_type
member.summary: A string that is an absolute URI, that is used as a type indicator.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoEntry.content_encoding
member.summary: An optional null‐terminated string in UTF‐8 characters used to indicate that the binary file is encoded and needs to be decoded before interpreted. The values are as defined for Content‐Encoding for HTTP/1.1.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoEntry.item_hidden
member.summary: A bool value, that shows if item is hidden.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoEntry.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemInfoEntry.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemLocationBox
member.summary: The item location box provides a directory of resources in this or other files, by locating their container, their offset within that container, and their length.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemLocationBox.offset_size
member.summary: Indicates the length in bytes of the offset field.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemLocationBox.length_size
member.summary: Indicates the length in bytes of the length field.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemLocationBox.base_offset_size
member.summary: Indicates the length in bytes of the base_offset field.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemLocationBox.index_size
member.summary: Indicates the length in bytes of the extent.index field.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemLocationBox.item_count
member.summary: Counts the number of items in the location item array.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemLocationBox.items
member.summary: Array of the location items.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemLocationBox.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.summary: Observable collection of the location items.

member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box size.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemPropertiesBox
member.summary: The ItemPropertiesBox enables the association of any item with an ordered set of item properties. Item properties are small data records.

member.summary: Contains an implicitly indexed list of item properties.

member.summary: Count of associations.

member.summary: Item property association entry data.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemPropertyAssociation.ItemPropertyEntryAssociation.essential
member.summary: Set to 1 indicates that the associated property is essential to the item, otherwise it is non-essential.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemPropertyAssociation.ItemPropertyEntryAssociation.property_index
member.summary: Is either 0 indicating that no property is associated (the essential indicator shall also be 0), or is the 1-based index of the associated property box in the ItemPropertyContainerBox contained in the same ItemPropertiesBox.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ProtectionSchemeInfoBox
member.summary: The Protection Scheme Information Box contains all the information required both to understand the encryption transform applied and its parameters, and also to find other information such as the kind and location of the key management system.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.ItemReferenceBox
member.summary: Contains all the linking of one item to others via typed references. All references for one item of a specific type are collected into a single item type reference box.

member.summary: List of references.

member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.summary: Observable collection of the references.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.LayerSelectorProperty
member.summary:
If the decoding of a multi-layer image item results into more than one reconstructed image, the 'lsel' item property shall be associated with the image item.Otherwise, the 'lsel' item property shall not be associated with an image item.
This property is used to select which of the reconstructed images is described by subsequent descriptive item properties in the item property association order and manipulated by transformative item properties, if any, to generate an output image of the image item.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.LayerSelectorProperty.layer_id
member.summary: Specifies the layer identifier of the image among the reconstructed images that is described by subsequent descriptive item properties in the item property association order and manipulated by transformative item properties, if any, to generate an output image of the image item.The semantics of layer_id are specific to the coding format and are therefore defined for each coding format for which the decoding of a multi-layer image item can result into more than one reconstructed images.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.LayerSelectorProperty.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.LayerSelectorProperty.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box size.

member.summary: The PixelInformationProperty descriptive item property indicates the number and bit depth of colour components in the reconstructed image of the associated image item.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.PixelInformationProperty.num_channels
member.summary: This field signals the number of channels by each pixel of the reconstructed image ofthe associated image item.

member.summary: This field indicates the bits per channel for the pixels of the reconstructed image of the associated image item.

member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.summary: This box contains the identifier of the primary item.

member.summary: The identifier of the primary item.

member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box size.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.RelativeLocationProperty
member.summary: The RelativeLocationProperty descriptive item property is used to describe the horizontal and vertical position of the reconstructed image of the associated image item relative to the reconstructed image of the related image item identified through the 'tbas' item reference.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.RelativeLocationProperty.horizontal_offset
member.summary: Specifies the horizontal offset in pixels of the left-most pixel column of the reconstructed image of the associated image item in the reconstructed image of the related image item. The left-most pixel column of the reconstructed image of the related image item has a horizontal offset equal to 0.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.RelativeLocationProperty.vertical_offset
member.summary: Specifies the vertical offset in pixels of the top-most pixel row of the reconstructed image of the associated image item in the reconstructed image of the related image item. The top-most pixel row of the reconstructed image of the related image item has a vertical offset equal to 0.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.RelativeLocationProperty.ToString
member.summary: Text summary of the box.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.RelativeLocationProperty.#ctor(FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Create the box object from the bitstream and box size.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader
member.summary: The BitStreamReader class is designed to read bits from a specified stream. It reads a minimal amount of bytes from the stream into an intermediate buffer and then reads the bits from the buffer, returning the read value. If there is still enough data in the buffer, the data is read from it.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.stream
member.summary: File stream.

member.name: F:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.state
member.summary: Bit reader state.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32)
member.summary: The constructor takes a Stream object and an optional buffer size as parameters.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.GetBitPosition
member.summary:
Gets the current position within the bitstream.
The bitstream position is x8 of stream position, adjusted according to the number of bits read from the latest byte.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.SetBytePosition(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets the current position within the bitstream.
member.param: The new byte position within the bitstream.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.ByteAligned
member.summary: Indicates if the current position in the bitstream is on a byte boundary.
member.returns: Returns true if the current position in the bitstream is on a byte boundary, false otherwise.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.MoreData
member.summary: Indicates if there are more data in the bitstream.
member.returns: True if there are more data in the bitstream, false otherwise.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.FillBufferFromStream
member.summary: Fill reader buffer with data from stream.
member.returns: The tolal amount of bytes read into the buffer.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.Read(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads the specified number of bits from the stream.
member.param: The required number of bits to read.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.ReadString
member.summary: Reads bytes as ASCII characters until '\0'.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.ReadFlag
member.summary: Reads one bit and returns true if it is 1, otherwise false.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.Peek(System.Int32)
member.summary: Peeks the specified number of bits from the stream. This method does not change the position of the underlying stream, state of the reader remains unchanged.
member.param: The required number of bits to read.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.SkipBits(System.Int32)
member.summary: Skip the specified number of bits in the stream.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.GetBit(System.Int64)
member.summary: Reads bit at the specified position. This method does not change the position of the underlying stream, state of the reader remains unchanged. This method is approximately 50% slower than the Read method.

member.name: T:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.BitReaderState
member.summary: Supporting reader structure that contains buffer with read data, position of cursor and other supporting data.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.BitReaderState.Buffer
member.summary: Buffer data read from stream.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.BitReaderState.BufferActiveLength
member.summary: Buffer size in bytes.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.BitReaderState.BufferPosition
member.summary: Tracks the current byte position in the buffer.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.BitReaderState.BitIndex
member.summary: Tracks the current bit position in the buffer.

member.name: P:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.BitReaderState.LastStreamPosition
member.summary: Last position of the stream the data was read from.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.BitReaderState.Reset
member.summary: Resets buffer to empty state.

member.name: M:FileFormat.IsoBmff.IO.BitStreamReader.BitReaderState.ToString
member.summary: Returns buffer contect in hex notation.
